title: If I Had My Life to Live Over Again, I Would Love You Again - Novel Updates
genre: Mystery   Romance   School Life   Slice of Life   Tragedy
tags: Childhood Friends   Death of Loved Ones   Doting Love Interests   Kind Love Interests   Mysterious Past   Strong Love Interests   Terminal Illness   Time Travel
author: Aoyama Minami
description:
It’s been three years since I married my first love. I was living a happy life. However, one day, that happiness turned into despair–

In order to save her, I decided to start over from junior high school with the power to rewind time.

A mystery filled with pure love, where tears never stop.>
